EmailTemplate.subject: Complete your application now to secure your role! - Deadline 2nd March
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. The email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Please instead contact the Staffing Team on seasonalroles@the-challenge.org. ALUMNI 2015 - FAST TRACK YOUR APPLICATION!
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
We noticed you started your application to work with us again on the NCS programme.
Roles are filling fast for the summer programme so complete your application by our deadline to secure your position!
Until your application is complete we will not be able to...
Allocate and secure your role for the summer Book you onto specialised returner training Begin the essential information process
Completing your application by our 2nd of March deadline means you will...
Be first in line to be allocated a role - the choice will be yours! Have first pick of our specialised returner training - no more full training if you have done the role before.
Click here to continue your application! https://staffing.the-challenge.org
We are really looking forward to having you back to work with us again this year. Get your application to us by the 2nd of March and we are able to fast track you through our process!
Looking forward to catching up with you very soon.
Best wishes,
The Challenge NCS Programme seasonal-roles@the-challenge.org CA 1.9f VISIT NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG NOW
